message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. It's a high-quality item that has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. Considering its superior features and durability, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a price of $120 for the product. This includes not only the cost of the item but also the value it will bring to your life. I look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of your product, $120 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $80 for it, which is the maximum I can afford.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your interest in our product. In light of this, I am willing to meet you halfway. I propose a final offer of $95 for the product. This price reflects the value of the item while staying within your budget. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
